title: The Ninety Days Of Genevieve
description: When Genevieve Lofton began business negotiations with the arrogant and attractive James Sinclair, she never imagined she would succumb to a ninety-day sex contract. As she becomes the star performer in his increasingly kinky and erotic fantasies, she is thrown into a world of sexual misadventure and decadence.
author: Lucinda Carrington
